android.view
Interface IWindowManager

All Superinterfaces:
IInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
IWindowManager.Stub
public interface IWindowManager
extends IInterface

System private interface to the window manager.

Nested Class Summary
static class IWindowManager.Stub
          Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

setRotation

void setRotation(int rotation,
                 boolean alwaysSendConfiguration)
                 throws RemoteException
Change the current screen rotation, constants as per Surface.

Parameters:
rotation - the intended rotation.
alwaysSendConfiguration - Flag to force a new configuration to be evaluated. This can be used when there are other parameters in configuration that are changing. Surface.
Throws:
RemoteException

getRotation

int getRotation()
                throws RemoteException
Retrieve the current screen orientation, constants as per Surface.

Throws:
RemoteException

watchRotation

int watchRotation(IRotationWatcher watcher)
                  throws RemoteException
Watch the rotation of the screen. Returns the current rotation, calls back when it changes.

Throws:
RemoteException
